description: Actions and events related to the inspected page belong to the page domain.

types.description: List of settings able to be overridden by WebInspector.
A user preference that can be overriden by Web Inspector, like an accessibility preference.
Resource type as it was perceived by the rendering engine.
Coordinate system used by supplied coordinates.
Information about the Frame on the page.

properties.name: loaderId
properties.description: Identifier of the loader associated with this frame.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Frame's name as specified in the tag.

properties.name: mimeType
properties.description: Frame document's mimeType as determined by the browser.

properties.name: mimeType
properties.description: Resource mimeType as determined by the browser.

properties.name: failed
properties.description: True if the resource failed to load.

properties.name: canceled
properties.description: True if the resource was canceled during loading.

properties.name: sourceMapURL
properties.description: URL of source map associated with this resource (if any).

properties.name: targetId
properties.description: Identifier for the context of where the load originated. In general this is the target identifier. For Workers this will be the workerId.

types.description: Information about the Frame hierarchy along with their cached resources.

properties.name: frame
properties.description: Frame information for this tree item.

properties.name: matchesCount
properties.description: Number of matches in the resource content.

properties.name: session
properties.description: True in case of session cookie.

commands.name: enable
commands.description: Enables page domain notifications.

commands.name: disable
commands.description: Disables page domain notifications.

commands.name: reload
commands.description: Reloads the main frame of the inspected page.

parameters.name: ignoreCache
parameters.description: If true, the page is reloaded from its origin without using cached resources.

parameters.name: revalidateAllResources
parameters.description: If true, all cached subresources will be revalidated when the main resource loads. Otherwise, only expired cached subresources will be revalidated (the default behavior for most WebKit clients).

commands.name: navigate
commands.description: Navigates current page to the given URL.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL to navigate the page to.

commands.name: overrideUserAgent
commands.description: Override's the user agent of the inspected page

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Value to override the user agent with. If this value is not provided, the override is removed. Overrides are removed when Web Inspector closes/disconnects.

commands.name: overrideSetting
commands.description: Allows the frontend to override the inspected page's settings.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Value to override the setting with. If this value is not provided, the override is removed. Overrides are removed when Web Inspector closes/disconnects.

commands.name: overrideUserPreference
commands.description: Allows the frontend to override the user's preferences on the inspected page.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Value to override the user preference with. If this value is not provided, the override is removed. Overrides are removed when Web Inspector closes/disconnects.

commands.name: getCookies
commands.description: Returns all browser cookies. Depending on the backend support, will return detailed cookie information in the cookies field.

commands.name: setCookie
commands.description: Sets a new browser cookie with the given name, domain, and path.

commands.name: deleteCookie
commands.description: Deletes browser cookie with given name, domain, and path.

parameters.name: cookieName
parameters.description: Name of the cookie to remove.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL to match cookie domain and path.

commands.name: getResourceTree
commands.description: Returns present frame / resource tree structure.

commands.name: getResourceContent
commands.description: Returns content of the given resource.

parameters.name: frameId
parameters.description: Frame id to get resource for.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the resource to get content for.

returns.name: base64Encoded
returns.description: True, if content was served as base64.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: If `source` is provided (and not empty), it will be injected into all future global objects as soon as they're created. Omitting `source` will stop this from happening.

commands.name: searchInResource
commands.description: Searches for given string in resource content.

parameters.name: frameId
parameters.description: Frame id for resource to search in.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: URL of the resource to search in.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: String to search for.

parameters.name: caseSensitive
parameters.description: If true, search is case sensitive.

parameters.name: isRegex
parameters.description: If true, treats string parameter as regex.

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: Request id for resource to search in.

commands.name: searchInResources
commands.description: Searches for given string in frame / resource tree structure.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: String to search for.

parameters.name: caseSensitive
parameters.description: If true, search is case sensitive.

parameters.name: isRegex
parameters.description: If true, treats string parameter as regex.

commands.name: setShowRulers
commands.description: Requests that backend draw rulers in the inspector overlay

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: True for showing rulers

commands.name: setShowPaintRects
commands.description: Requests that backend shows paint rectangles

parameters.name: result
parameters.description: True for showing paint rectangles

commands.name: setEmulatedMedia
commands.description: Emulates the given media for CSS media queries.

parameters.name: media
parameters.description: Media type to emulate. Empty string disables the override.

commands.name: snapshotNode
commands.description: Capture a snapshot of the specified node that does not include unrelated layers.

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Id of the node to snapshot.

commands.name: snapshotRect
commands.description: Capture a snapshot of the page within the specified rectangle and coordinate system.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Rectangle width

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Rectangle height

parameters.name: coordinateSystem
parameters.description: Indicates the coordinate system of the supplied rectangle.

commands.name: archive
commands.description: Grab an archive of the page.

commands.name: setScreenSizeOverride
commands.description: Overrides screen size exposed to DOM and used in media queries for testing with provided values.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Screen width

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Screen height

events.name: frameNavigated
events.description: Fired once navigation of the frame has completed. Frame is now associated with the new loader.

parameters.name: frame
parameters.description: Frame object.

events.name: frameDetached
events.description: Fired when frame has been detached from its parent.

parameters.name: frameId
parameters.description: Id of the frame that has been detached.

events.name: frameStartedLoading
events.description: Fired when frame has started loading.

parameters.name: frameId
parameters.description: Id of the frame that has started loading.

events.name: frameStoppedLoading
events.description: Fired when frame has stopped loading.

parameters.name: frameId
parameters.description: Id of the frame that has stopped loading.

events.name: frameScheduledNavigation
events.description: Fired when frame schedules a potential navigation.

parameters.name: frameId
parameters.description: Id of the frame that has scheduled a navigation.

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: Delay (in seconds) until the navigation is scheduled to begin. The navigation is not guaranteed to start.

events.name: frameClearedScheduledNavigation
events.description: Fired when frame no longer has a scheduled navigation.

parameters.name: frameId
parameters.description: Id of the frame that has cleared its scheduled navigation.

events.name: defaultUserPreferencesDidChange
events.description: Fired when the default value of a user preference changes at the system level.

parameters.name: preferences
parameters.description: List of user preferences that can be overriden and their new system (default) values.
